thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Martyn Battle

author: Martyn Battle
title: Martyn Battle
text: I needed a cycle carrier in a hurry. I contacted Micks garage with a query and spoke to Ciaran who advised me on the type I needed for my particular car. He was prompt with his answers and I placed the order. The delivery was made the following morning. As a follow up enquiry regarding the account I had contact with Miky who gave me good advice about their web site. The product I bought was of good quality and also a very good price. All round I am very pleased with the service given by this company and would buy from them again.
